title: Hit and Run
author: Johnstone, Doug
snippet: He turned left on Salisbury Road. Bigger buildings, Victorian built, darker stone, walled gardens, a hotel and a medical centre.

title: Hit and Run
author: Johnstone, Doug
snippet: At the end of Salisbury Road he stopped. The Commie Pool was across the road, shrouded in scaffolding and infested with cranes.
